verses.verse: "When <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was a <S%H5288>child,<s%> then I <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7121>him,<s%> and called my <S%H1121>son<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

They <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H1980>them,<s%> so they went from <S%H6440>them.<s%> They <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> and burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to engraved <S%H6456>images.<s%>
Yet I <S%H8637>taught<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H8637>walk.<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> them by his <S%H2220>arms;<s%> but they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that I healed <S%H7495>them.<s%>

I <S%H4900>drew<s%> them with <S%H2256>cords<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> with <S%H5688>ties<s%> of <S%H160>love;<s%> and I was to them like those who lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> on their <S%H3895>necks;<s%> and I bent <S%H5186>down<s%> to him and I fed <S%H398>him.<s%>

"They <S%H7725>won't<s%> return into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> but the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> will be their <S%H4428>king,<s%> because they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>repent.<s%>

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> will <S%H2342>fall<s%> on their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and will <S%H3615>destroy<s%> the <S%H905>bars<s%> of their <S%H398>gates,<s%> and will put an end to their <S%H4156>plans.<s%>
My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H8511>determined<s%> to <S%H4878>turn<s%> from <S%H7121>me.<s%> Though they call to the Most <S%H5920>High,<s%> he <S%H3162>certainly<s%> <S%H7311>won't<s%> exalt them.

"How can I give you <S%H5414>up,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim?<s%> How can I <S%H4042>hand<s%> you <S%H3478>over,<s%> Israel? How can I <S%H5414>make<s%> you like <S%H126>Admah?<s%> How can I <S%H5414>make<s%> you like <S%H6636>Zeboiim?<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> within <S%H5150>me,<s%> my compassion <S%H3162>is<s%> <S%H3648>aroused.<s%>

I will not <S%H6213>execute<s%> the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of my <S%H639>anger.<s%> I will not <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> for I am <S%H410>God,<s%> and not <S%H376>man;<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H935>you;<s%> and I will not come in <S%H5892>wrath.<s%>

They will <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who will <S%H7580>roar<s%> like a <S%H738>lion;<s%> for he will <S%H7580>roar,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> will come <S%H2729>trembling<s%> from the <S%H3220>west.<s%>

They will come <S%H2729>trembling<s%> like a <S%H6833>bird<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and like a <S%H3123>dove<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> and I will <S%H3427>settle<s%> them in their <S%H1004>houses,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5437>surrounds<s%> me with <S%H3585>falsehood,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H4820>deceit.<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> still <S%H7300>strays<s%> from <S%H410>God,<s%> and is <S%H539>unfaithful<s%> to the Holy <S%H6918>One.<s%>
